solver.search.measure

Interface IMeasures

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, ISearchMonitor, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeasuresRecorder

    public interface IMeasures
extends ISearchMonitor, Serializable, Cloneable
    Interface for providing resolution statistics
    Author:
    Charles Prud'Homme, Jean-Guillaume Fages
